channel.title: Cafe on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Cafe on Game6r

item.title: Crystals Sweets Shop
item.description: Games Waitress in a cafe will plunge you into the atmosphere of a holiday, cheerful mood and a huge selection of all kinds of cakes and pastries. Every child dreams of visiting a fabulous establishment on New Year’s Eve, where the beautiful Snow Maiden delivers food, and at the same time fulfills any, even the most cherished desire. Today you have to become a cafe hostess and a waitress at the same time in a game for girls.

item.title: Mermaid Coffee Shop
item.description: Game Cafe - an exciting economic strategy. The main goal is to build your own business so that it is guaranteed to bring income. Today you have the opportunity to become a fast food tycoon. To do this, you need to perform simple tasks and carefully calculate all your actions. It is necessary to build a network of shops, cafes and eateries, and lure as many people as possible into them.

item.title: Natalies Winter Treats
item.description: While playing Barbie Cafe you will help a pretty girl cope with the influx of customers and prepare a huge amount of delicious ice cream. This delicacy is made from many ingredients, so listen to the wishes of the client and prepare a special dessert for him. But keep in mind, the time of the game is limited, so you should hurry up.
